# Load Cleaned Data
```{r}
employees.matrix <- read.csv("cleaned.data.csv")
employees.matrix$X <- NULL
```

# Create Clusters
```{r}
fviz_nbclust(employees.matrix, kmeans, method = "wss")
fviz_nbclust(employees.matrix, kmeans, method = "gap_stat", iter.max=50)
fviz_nbclust(employees.matrix, kmeans, method = "silhouette")
```
